-- | Quasi-quoter for Alex lexers
--   
@package alex-meta
@version 0.3.0.8

module Text.Alex.AlexTemplate
alexTemplate :: t -> String

module Text.Alex.Quote
parseAlex :: String -> Alex
compileAlex :: Alex -> Q [Dec]
type Alex = String
alex :: QuasiQuoter
